publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5589 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Representation of the People (Post-Local Government Elections Supply and Inspection of Documents) (Scotland) Regulations 2007—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Representation of the People (Post-Local Government Elections Supply and Inspection of Documents) (Scotland) Regulations 2007 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon*

S2M-5589 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Representation of the People (Post-Local Government Elections Supply and Inspection of Documents) (Scotland) Regulations 2007—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Representation of the People (Post-Local Government Elections Supply and Inspection of Documents) (Scotland) Regulations 2007 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon
